name: Shattered Hand
desc: Normal damage and 1d2 Con and Str damage. Hand useless until healed

name: Rattled
desc: Normal damage and target is confused for 1d3 rounds (Fort negates)

name: Thunder Strike
desc: Double damage and target is deafened for 1d4 rounds

name: Lights Out
desc: Normal damage and target is blinded for 1d3 rounds

name: Crushed Trachea
desc: Normal damage and target cannot breathe or speak DC 20 Heal check ends condition

name: Split Open
desc: Double damage and 1d4 bleed

name: Feeble Parry
desc: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

name: Surprise Opening
desc: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

name: Back Breaker
desc: Double damage and 1d6 Dex damage

name: Terrible Bruise
desc: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

name: Broken Leg
desc: Normal damage and 1d4 Con and Dex damage. Target's speeds are reduced by half until healed

name: Spun Around
desc: Normal damage and target is flat-footed for 1 round

name: Where Am I?
desc: Normal damage and target is stunned for 1 round

name: To Your Thinky Bits
desc: Double damage and 1 Int bleed (Fort negates save each round)

name: Crunch
desc: Double damage and target is nauseated for 1 round (Fort negates)

name: Armor Dent
desc: Double damage and 2d6 damage to metal armor (ignore hardness)

name: Breathless
desc: Normal damage and target is exhausted for 1d4 rounds

name: Mace to da Face
desc: Normal damage and target dazed and blinded for 1 round

name: Tiring Blow
desc: Double damage plus target is fatigued

name: Concussion
desc: Normal damage and 1d2 Int and Wis damage

name: Ruptured Spleen
desc: Normal damage and 1d6 bleed. This bleed can only be cured with magic

name: Solid Blow
desc: Triple damage

name: Crumpling Blow
desc: Double damage and target is knocked prone

name: Collapsed Lung
desc: Normal damage and target is staggered for 1d6 rounds

name: Flat Foot
desc: Double damage and 1 Dex damage and target's speeds are reduced by 5 feet until healed

name: Skull Crush
desc: Double damage and 2d6 Int drain (Fort half)

name: And Stay Down!
desc: Normal damage and target is knocked prone and stunned for 1 round (Fort negates stun)

name: Bone Masher
desc: Normal damage and either 1d3 Dex damage and halve speed (leg) or 1d3 Str damage (arm). Limb useless until healed

name: 2 for 1
desc: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target

name: Crushed Intestines
desc: Normal damage and 1d4 Con bleed (DC 15 Fort negates, save each round)

name: Numbing Blow
desc: Normal damage and 1d4 Dex damage and target is disarmed (1 item, Ref negates drop)

name: Roundhouse
desc: Normal damage and a free attack against adjacent foes at the same bonus

name: Staggering Blow
desc: Normal damage and double nonlethal damage

name: My Teef!
desc: Normal damage and 1 Con damage. Target loses bite, gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells

name: Earth Rumble
desc: Normal damage and a free trip attempt versus target and all adjacent enemies

name: Pimp Slap
desc: Normal damage and target dazed for 1d4 rounds

name: Cracked Rib
desc: Normal damage and 1d3 Con damage and target is fatigued

name: Box the Ears
desc: Normal damage and target deafened for 1d4 hours

name: Bell Ringer
desc: Normal damage and 1d2 Int damage and sickened for 1d4 rounds

name: Momentum
desc: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

name: Broken nose
desc: Normal damage and 1 Cha damage and 1 bleed

name: Broken Ribs
desc: Double damage and target cannot heal naturally for 1d4 days

name: Knockback
desc: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

name: Low Blow
desc: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

name: Brained
desc: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

name: Shield Smack
desc: Double damage and target's shield is disarmed

name: I See Stars
desc: Normal damage and target takes a 20% miss chance for 1d4 rounds

name: Nighty Night
desc: Normal damage and target is unconscious for 1d4 rounds (Fort negates)

name: Cracked Knee
desc: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage. Target's base land speed reduced to 10 feet until healed

name: What's Going On?
desc: Double damage and 1d4 hours of target's memory erased

name: Crushed Toe
desc: Normal damage and 1d4 Dex damage. Target's land speed is halved until healed

name: Off Balance
desc: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents
